miic.core.miic_utils.flatten¶

flatten(x)[source]¶

Return the flattened version of the input array x

This funciton works with all Iterable that can be nested in an irregular fashion.

>>>L=[[[1, 2, 3], [4, 5]], 6] >>>flatten(L) [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]

Param:Iterable to be flattened
Return type:list
Returns:x as a flattened list
